onboardingOneDescription: The application provides irrigation control with a friendly user interface so you can control the pump's operation.
onboardingTwoDescription: The application provides a tool that detects diseases. Simply take a photo, and the app will process it for you.
onboardingThreeDescription: Using solar panels as an energy saving aid.
welcomeText: Welcome to Smart Irrigation â€“ Where technology meets nature
pickImage: Pick image to identify the type
weedCardDesc: Know if there are diseases or weeds in your farm.
pumpCardDesc: Control the pump of the device and water your plants!
makeSureImageInFocus: Ensure the plants are in focus
motorDescription: Controls the pivot irrigation motor for efficient water distribution
user_not_found: No user found for that email.
locNetworkError: Please check your internet connection and try again
Corn_Cercospora_leaf_spot_Gray_leaf_spot: Gray leaf spot causes gray-tan rectangular lesions on corn leaves, reducing photosynthesis and yield.
Corn_healthy_description: Corn leaves are healthy. No disease detected.
Corn_Northern_Leaf_Blight_description: Northern Leaf Blight produces elongated gray-green lesions, leading to premature leaf death.
Potato___Early_blight_description: Early blight causes dark concentric spots, leading to leaf drop and reduced tuber yield.
Potato___healthy_description: Potato leaves are healthy. No disease detected.
Potato___Late_blight_description: Late blight causes brown water-soaked lesions, known for the Irish Potato Famine.
Weeds_description: Weeds compete with crops for resources, lowering crop health and yield.
Wheat_brown_rust_description: Brown rust appears as reddish-brown pustules and affects wheat yield.
Wheat___Healthy_description: Wheat is healthy. No disease present.
